Total Time: 30 minutes
 
 Category: Breakfast
 
 Serving Size: 6
 
 Ingredients:
 1 1\2 cup hollandaise sauce
 3 english muffins 
 3 tbsp. butter
 6 slices canadian-style bacon/ham
 6 eggs
 4 tsp. distilled white vinegar
 

Instructions:
 1. In 1-quart saucepan, stir egg yolks and lemon juice. Add 1/4 cup of the butter. Cook on low, until butter is melted. Add remaining butter, melt.
 2. Split English muffins; toast. Spread each muffin half with some of the 3 tablespoons butter; keep warm.
 3. In 10-inch skillet, melt 1 teaspoon butter over medium heat. Cook bacon in butter until light brown on both sides; keep warm.
 4. Fill skillet with 2 to 3 inches water. Add vinegar to water. Heat to boiling; reduce to simmering. Break cold eggs into saucer, add to water. Cook 3 to 5 minutes. Remove.
 5. Place 1 slice bacon on each muffin half. Top with egg. Spoon warm sauce over eggs. Sprinkle with paprika. 
 6. Enjoy!
